channel.title: [600+] Changing run.bat to run?
channel.description:
[code]@echo off title blank java -client -Xmx1024m -cp bin;lib/* org.dementhium.RS2ServerBootstrap pause[/code]
How can I get this to run on my java?
and this one:
[code]@echo off java -cp asm-all-3.3.jar;clientlibs.jar; RunClient servaddr 0.0.0.0 pause[/code]

item.title: [600+] Changing run.bat to run?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.czar Mr.czar
item.description:
@Mr.czar wrote:

Of course, these aren’t random ones. I can’t get them to work so I must be running a different type of java. So I asked what do I change to correspond it to my java?

Read full topic

item.title: [600+] Changing run.bat to run?
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

u cant just use a random one…It has to be loading the correct file and looking in the correct place to load the client.

Read full topic
